thread.section_title: Hotel Newton - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice hotel for the old times
thread.title_full: Nice hotel for the old times - Review of Hotel Newton, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Manuel C
title: Nice hotel for the old times
text:
Well located in west upper manhattan if you to business or Columbia University.
Near to Harlem and full of different churches and some shopping, incredible amount of coffee bars, and full of restaurants !
The hotel perform well, vintage (real) decoration , really good service people and good breakfast in the close Manhattan diner.
